mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS num, cnt, content FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(content) AS cnt, content from (SELECT * FROM content_searching WHERE search_date >= '${date}') GROUP BY content) ORDER BY cnt DESC)

SELECT ROWNUM AS num, cnt, content FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(content) AS cnt, content from (SELECT * FROM content_searching WHERE search_date <= '${toDate}' AND search_date >= '${fromDate}') GROUP BY content) ORDER BY cnt DESC)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS num, m.movie_id, m.movie_nm, m.poster_url, ml.like_num FROM movie_info m JOIN ( SELECT movie_id, COUNT(movie_id) AS like_num FROM movie_like WHERE like_date <= '${date}' GROUP BY movie_id ORDER BY like_num DESC ) ml ON m.movie_id = ml.movie_id) WHERE ROWNUM <= 50
